Class ParserWorldObserver

java.lang.Object
edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.textui.ParserWorldObserver
All Implemented Interfaces:
IWorldObserver, IParserObserver
public abstract class ParserWorldObserver extends Object implements IParserObserver, IWorldObserver
An partial implementation of IParserObserver and IWorldObserver that factors out the common code between graphical and command-line text-based interfaces. Subclasses "fill in the blanks" by implementing the abstract methods.

    • update

      public void update(World world)
      Invoked by the game model when its state has changed. Typically, this indicates that it has an interesting message it wants to communicate to the user. Thus, we output the message to the user. If the game is over, we note this through the game model and terminate this program.
      Specified by:
      update in interface IWorldObserver
      Parameters:
      world - the changed world object.
      See Also:
      • IWorldObserver.update(World)
